metadata.Title: CVE-2020-18976 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: Buffer Overflow in Tcpreplay v4.3.2 allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service via the 'do_checksum' function in 'checksum.c'. It can be triggered by sending a crafted pcap file to the 'tcpreplay-edit' binary. This issue is different than CVE-2019-8381.

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
